hero.heroDesc: ...who likes to craft solid and scalable frontend products with great user experiences.

skillsList.name: JAVASCRIPT
skillsList.skillDesc: Proficient in using JavaScript extensively in projects, with a strong command of the language's core concepts. Capable of writing and optimizing complex code structures for enhanced performance and maintainability.

skillsList.name: REACT
skillsList.skillDesc: Highly skilled in React, applying advanced techniques and best practices for seamless integration in modern applications. Capable of building efficient, maintainable structures while optimizing for performance.

skillsList.name: REDUX
skillsList.skillDesc: Proficient in managing application state with Redux, especially in complex projects. Capable of creating optimized, maintainable state management structures for scalable data flow control.

skillsList.name: NODE
skillsList.skillDesc: Intermediate proficiency in Node.js, with the ability to handle back-end development for simple to medium-level applications, ensuring both security and performance in server-side code.

skillsList.name: HTML
skillsList.skillDesc: Fully adept at using HTML5, following semantic and accessibility standards for optimal structure. Creates clean, well-structured, and responsive code for modern web applications.

skillsList.name: CSS
skillsList.skillDesc: Highly skilled in CSS3 and preprocessors, utilizing modern styling techniques and animations effectively. Crafts responsive designs that adapt seamlessly to different screens and devices.

skillsList.name: BOOTSTRAP
skillsList.skillDesc: Experienced in Bootstrap for quickly developing responsive designs. Customizes interfaces for user-centric designs that enhance UI/UX.

skillsList.name: TAILWIND
skillsList.skillDesc: Proficient in Tailwind CSS, enabling rapid, modular styling. Specializes in creating personalized, high-performance user interfaces.

skillsList.name: GITHUB
skillsList.skillDesc: Highly proficient in using GitHub for version control and collaborative development. Effectively manages branches and integrates best practices for team-oriented projects.

skillsList.name: VSCODE
skillsList.skillDesc: Efficient in using Visual Studio Code, optimizing productivity through advanced configurations and extensions. Customizes the workspace effectively for project-specific needs.

profile.aboutText1: For eight years, I worked as a physics teacher and took great joy in inspiring my students with a love for science. However, I have long held a deep interest and excitement for software development. This field, which combines problem-solving and creativity, has continuously drawn me in over the years..
profile.aboutText2: Now, I believe it’s time to follow my dreams. Rather than chasing money, I want to pursue my passions and grow in the world of software development. I am eager to learn, contribute, and thrive in this field.

projectList.heading: Pizza Order Challange
projectList.desc: I created a Homepage, Order Form and Order Received page for the brand Teknolojik Yemeks', a website designed to bring food to hungry software developers sitting in front of their computers.

projectList.heading: Dinamik Menu
projectList.desc: In a café website project I developed using React and CSS, a login system was implemented that allows only users with administrative privileges to access it. After logging in, administrators are provided with an interface where they can dynamically update the menu. This system also integrates menu data stored in an Excel spreadsheet, enabling updates to be made through the spreadsheet when needed. The project aims to deliver a user-friendly front-end experience while providing an easy-to-use management panel for administrators.

projectList.heading: Movie List
projectList.desc: I developed an application using React and Redux that features a movie list. Users can view the available movies in the list, add new movies, mark movies as favorites, or remove previously added movies from their favorites. Redux plays a central role in managing the application state, ensuring consistency and easy access to information such as the list of favorite movies and the overall movie list. This structure allows users to interact with the application intuitively and efficiently.
